41.eng-name: The Book of al-Fara' and al-'Atirah

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Ibn 'Abbas, form Maimunah, that:a mouse fell into some cooking fat and died. The Prophet was asked (about that) and he said: "Throw it away, and whatever is around it, and eat (the rest)

chapter.eng-name: If A Mouse Falls Into The Cooking Fat
